panels.description: KMM Status shows current state of kafka-mirror-maker. It can be UP,  DEGRADED, FAILED.
panels.title: KMM Status

panels.description: Node Status shows the amount of alive and failed instances.
panels.title: Node Status

panels.description: Heap Memory Usage shows the amount of memory that is using for the heap.
panels.title: Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: Eden Space shows the amount of memory that is using for eden space. A metric value of "-1" means that the value is not set
panels.title: Eden Space

panels.description: Survivor Space shows the amount of memory that is using for survivor space. A metric value of "-1" means that the value is not set
panels.title: Survivor Space

panels.description: Non-Heap Memory Usage shows the amount of memory that is using for non-heap area.
panels.title: Non-Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: Metaspace shows the amount of memory that is using for metaspace.
panels.title: Metaspace

panels.description: Thread Count shows the amount of active threads.
panels.title: Thread Count

panels.description: Replicated bytes shows the amount of replicated bytes.
panels.title: Replicated bytes

panels.description: Replicated records shows the amount of replicated bytes.
panels.title: Replicated records

panels.description: Record age shows age of each record when consumed.
panels.title: Record age

panels.description: Replication speed per second shows the amount of replicated bytes per second.
panels.title: Replication speed per second

panels.description: Replication latency shows a timespan between each record's timestamp and downstream ACK.
panels.title: Replication latency
